title: Vaccinate or not? Pros and cons of Naturopathy
author: SBG-TV
description: A hot button topic of conversation today is whether or not parents want the government calling the shots on the maintenance of health for their families, literally. Compulsory vaccinations such as those for measles, polio, and smallpox have been argued back and forth my supporters and anti-vaxxers alike for either their life-saving ability or their dangerous effects on well-being.
